trans-unit.source: Defines an installer that either succeeds completely or fails and leaves the computer in its initial state.
trans-unit.target: Define um instalador que completamente bem-sucedida ou falha e deixa o computador em seu estado inicial.

trans-unit.source: To run installers in a transaction, add them to the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A> property of this TransactedInstaller instance.
trans-unit.target: Para executar os instaladores em uma transação, adicioná-los para o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A>propriedade desta instância TransactedInstaller.</xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: This method calls the Install method of each installer contained in the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A> property of this instance.
trans-unit.target: Este método chama o método de instalação de cada instalador contida o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A>propriedade desta instância.</xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> object referenced by the `savedState` parameter is updated to reflect the status of the installation after the contained installers have run.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>objeto referenciado pelo `savedState` parâmetro é atualizado para refletir o status da instalação depois de executaram os instaladores independentes.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: If all the Install methods succeed, the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Se todos os métodos de instalação for bem-sucedida, o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>método é chamado.</xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A> method is called for each installer.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A>método é chamado para cada instalador.</xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> in which this method saves information needed to perform a commit, rollback, or uninstall operation.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>em que esse método salva as informações necessárias para executar um commit, rollback, ou a operação de desinstalação.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The savedState parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The savedState parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The installation failed, and is being rolled back.
trans-unit.target: A instalação falha e está sendo revertida.

trans-unit.source: Call this method to remove a previously completed installation.
trans-unit.target: Chame esse método para remover uma instalação concluída anteriormente.

trans-unit.source: This Uninstall method calls the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> method of each installer in the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A> property to uninstall any resources set during installation.
trans-unit.target: Chama esse método de desinstalar o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A>método de cada instalador no <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A>definida para desinstalar todos os recursos durante a instalação.</xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A> </xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A>

trans-unit.source: Any exceptions during uninstallation are ignored.
trans-unit.target: As exceções durante a desinstalação serão ignoradas.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Although the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A> and <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A> methods save the state of the computer after the installations, the file containing the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> from the `savedState` parameter might have been deleted at some point after the installation was complete.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Embora a <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A>e <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>métodos salvar o estado do computador após as instalações, o arquivo que contém o <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>do `savedState` parâmetro pode ter sido excluído em algum momento depois que a instalação foi concluída.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> </xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A> </xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the file is deleted, the `savedState` parameter is `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se o arquivo é excluído, o `savedState` parâmetro é `null`.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> that contains the state of the computer after the installation completed.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>que contém o estado do computador após a instalação ser concluída.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>
